sub_title: Human Power Architect , Master Trainer, Public Speaker, Success Coach, Creative Director
summary:
Strategic Communications Architect, Creative Ideation Catalyst, Human Resources Development Leader, Marketing and Media Champion, Master Trainer and Public Speaker, with distinguished 15 years of experience of horizontal exposure across several industries and vertical development. 

Alongside the in-depth rich experience, it is the child’s heart and curious mind that has made Bayan achieve a notable position that celebrates major turnarounds and bottom line successes.

The innovation comes through genuine caring for communicating the message in an enjoyable and interactive approach, no matter what the appropriate channel chosen is.

treasury_media.title: "BE"  The holistic rebirth workshop
treasury_media.description:
The Holistic Rebirth Workshop	

When: Sep 25th, 26th,& 27th 2014
Where: Maadi / Cairo – Egypt


This document includes the following:

-	Main Objectives
-	Main topics to be covered
-	Methodology
-	Main Benefits
-	Main Ideator & Facilitator
-	Speakers of Honor
-	Fees & Registration


Main Objectives:

-	How to just “Be”
-	How to let go
-	Who are you?
-	What is your Identity?
-	The Secrets of the Secret
-	Y.O.U. Your Own Universe
-	The Scale of Justice
-	SOL
-	The Symphony, Song, 
-	Script of Your Life
-	The Alchemy of Oneness
-	The Matrix of Your Mind; Your Life
-	Life Mapping
-	Inception & Symbolism
-	From Intention to Manifestation
-	What kind of meditation do you need?
-	Karma & Dharma
-	The Alchemy of Oneness


A powerful pilgrimage that dives in the deepest areas of your soul, lifts the veils of The challenges and pains to reveal the lessons behind them. Sets the compass of your life towards your soul’s purpose, and equips your ship with the necessary tools to know how to adjust the sails.


Main topics to be covered:

-	Individual and Collective Energy,   
-	Quantum Physics 
-	Analytical and Behavioral Psychology
-	Symbolism
-	Yoga and Meditation 
-	Sacred Music and Geometry 
-	Western, Jyotish , Lal Kitab and Arabic Astrology
-	Numerology 
-	The Science of Al Jafr
-	Kabbalah
-	The Grand Cardinal Cross (New World Order)
-	Sacred Texts references
-	Life Mapping


Methodology:

-	Simulations 
-	Drama and Music 
-	Group Exercises and Activities
-	Gamification
-	Speakers of Honor

Participants will be able to develop thorough understanding, awareness and consciousness for a full Holistic Rebirth.


Main Benefits:

By the end of the workshop (including the One-on-One Coaching Session) participants will:

-	Develop a quantum leap in their awareness and ascend to higher levels of consciousness
-	Would develop their own “Life Map” manual including all the information they find out about themselves, 
a.	Astrological map (Western. Jyotish and Lal Kitab)
b.	How to balance their planets
c.	Archetype
d.	Sacred higher self
e.	Soul mission
f.	Career or Work Compass
g.	Identified blockages
h.	Spotted dark shadows
i.	Soul mate resonance 
j.	The Musical “Pattern” of the trends of their lives
k.	Their name meaning, numerical and 
esoteric value according the science of 
Al Jafr, Numerology, Kabbalah and others
l.	How the “Grand Cardinal Cross” and 
the New World Order is affecting and the 
mechanisms to know how to balance and 
harmonize
m.	Would develop the knowledge and the skills of 
How to enter portals of their consciousness for 
“Inception” and how to use Symbolism 
n.	How to manage the “Purification” and the 
“Healing” Process

-	Would have in-depth knowledge of the Matrix of 
the mind and how it created and shapes their reality
-	Would awaken their witness and unlock their full potential 
-	Would empower their “Associa

treasury_media.title: Elmeedan Network Presentation
treasury_media.description:
Elmeedan - Where Dreams Come Trueï»¿

The First Social Network for Starting, Backing, Funding and Growing Projects.

In Elmeedan everyone UNITES to develop ideas into projects:

Celebrities become Ambassadors

Professionals become Mentors and Coaches

Help becomes online learning courses and live creative learningï»¿ sessions

YOU can have backers for your project as volunteers, or as partners

Instead of waiting for one or a few entities to fund your project you can have everyone funding your project through crowd funding.

www.elmeedan.com

profile_positions.description:
One International is a Family Business that honors the value of Family Enterprise and building legacies that stand the test of time founded and patroned by Hon. Mohammed Walid Al Hussain, it is a multi purpose organization that transcends ordinary solutions into extraordinary opportunities.

Driven by the solid and profound vision to “Let There Be Light!” One introduces the creative solutions for the new era of Media and Development that opens the gates to “communion” rather than “communication”.Main Services are;

-	Creative Human Capital Development
-      Talent management
-       Legacy management
-	Strategic Communication Strategies
-	Creative Communication Strategies
-	Marketing Plans, Branding Campaigns
-	Creative Ideation for ATL & BTL Campaigns
-	Public Relations Strategies 
-	Social & Digital Media 
-	Social Enterprise Creation
-	Art and Media Development and Production
-	Innovative Disruption of Social Enterprises & Social Entrepreneurship
profile_positions.title: C.E.O. - Visioneer

profile_positions.description: Clients include but not to be limited to, American Management Association-MEMCE, Pepsico, Lundbeck, DHL, Origin, Intel
profile_positions.title: Strategic Communication Expert - ManagementConsultant - Master Trainer

profile_positions.description:
Directing The Unit
Strategic Creative Communications Catalyst 
Master Trainer / Facilitator


Re-launch the ProMark brand, after being well known and identified in the market as the AMA. Developing and carrying through a Creative Strategic Marketing Plan and, Inventing a new approach for the client relation system. 

Directing and managing the strategic growth of the Talent Management & Continuity Unit, preparing budgets, recruiting human resources and Key Trainers, managing the marketing and the sales functions, and tailoring training plans and events in a result oriented enjoyable and creative approach. 


Clients included but not to be limited to, Mobinil, Vodafone, BP, Pfizer, GlaxosmithKline, ECC, Barclays, Egyptian Banking Institute, Orascom
profile_positions.title: Principal of the Talent Management & Continuity Unit

profile_positions.description:
The Master Trainer and consultant for major key accounts , conceptualizing , tailoring, developing and facilitating programs in the areas of, Creative Leadership, Creative Thinking, Visionary Leadership, Communication Skills, Team Building, and other soft skills programs tailored to client's needs.

Clients included but not to be limited to, Mobinil, Vodafone, DHL, Pfizer, Shell,
profile_positions.title: Master Trainer/ Faciltator & Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Lead and Managed the Icon of Training and Human Resources Development Company in Jordan, offering Training Programs, Human Resources Consulting , Recruitment, Executive Placement and Assessment, Research, Tailoring Manuals, Employee and Customer Satisfaction Surveys, Creative Development, Recognition Programs, as well as Events Management.

The List of clients included but not to be limited to, The Royal Hashemite Court, Andersen Consulting, Coca Cola, Oracle, Palestinian Telecommunication, City Bank, Nuqul Group, Aramex, and others.

Chairman Executive Officer 
Lead  In 2000 
Amman – Jordan 
June 1998 – Dec. 1999 

Conceptualized and lead the birth of the leading conference that was recognized as the milestone of events in Jordan, “Creative Leadership for the New Millennium”, which has been blessed to be Under The Patronage of My father The Honorable Mohammed Walid Al Hussain
profile_positions.title: Founder- Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
Hired as the “Training Manager “ at the Amra Forum Hotel, then promoted to Training and Human Resources Development Director. 

Succeeded in elevating the level of service, by launching a strongly creative development campaign, which lead to tangible results, after taking the post of Area Training and Human Resources Development Director. 

Responsiblities included achieving the annually set Training Plan, Research and Development, Needs Assessment, Appraisals, outsourcing, Internal Activities, Employee Satisfactions Surveys, Developing tailored Manuals, Budget, Recognition, Counseling, Coaching, recruitment, termination, conducting training programs to the top management, and launching new activities.
profile_positions.title: Training and Human Resources Development Director
